definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: It is the heavy metals contained in the waste effluent that can cause an environmental or disposal problem.
sentences.chinese: 就是流出廢液中的重金屬能導致環境或處理問題。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the method for determining controlled contents of As, Pb and Hg in Chinese medicinal materials.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定中藥材中重金屬砷鉛汞的控制含量方法。

sentences.english: The effect of plant ash on decreasing the content of heavy metals in plants were not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 草木灰對降低作物體內重金屬含量的效果不明顯。

sentences.english: Vermilion contains heavy metal arsenic and mercury.
sentences.chinese: 硃砂含有重金屬砷和汞。

sentences.english: Study on the inhibitory effect of heavy metals.
sentences.chinese: 研究了重金屬的抑制效應。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the content of heavy metals in Nephrolepis cordifolia increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 同時腎蕨對各種重金屬離子吸收總量也顯著提高。

sentences.english: Further research on how to control the content of heavy metal in Bombyx Batryticatus should be well developed.
sentences.chinese: 如何控制殭蠶中的重金屬含量有待深入研究。

sentences.english: Heavy metal and mullets its how we were raised.
sentences.chinese: 重金屬及如何提高其尾烏魚。

sentences.english: The correlation of heavy metals content between Seleng wormwood and soil was not significant.
sentences.chinese: 蘆蒿樣品與土壤中重金屬含量相關性不顯著。

sentences.english: I used to listen to a lot of hip-hop music and heavy metal when I was younger.
sentences.chinese: 我年輕的時候，我常常聽一些嘻哈和重金屬音樂。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of metal exposure on defecation behavior in nematode Caenorhabditis elegans.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究重金屬暴露對秀麗線蟲排泄行爲的影響。

sentences.english: This paper summarized the resent knowledge on heavy metal and pathogenic organisms in sludge.
sentences.chinese: 文章概述了有關污泥中重金屬及病源體的研究狀況。

sentences.english: We describe the influence of heavy metal pollution on the morphological and internal structural changes of aquatic Dipteral insects.
sentences.chinese: 水生雙翅目昆蟲是監測水體重金屬污染的理想對象。

sentences.english: It is very heavy and chemically resembles arsenic and antimony.
sentences.chinese: 像砷和銻一樣，鉍也是重金屬和重化學元素。

sentences.english: After burning the flat coal waste rock pile of the heavy metals pollution levels for light pollution.
sentences.chinese: 經過燃燒的平排矸石山重金屬污染等級爲輕污染。

sentences.english: This model will provide valuable reference for the heavy metal pollution forecast about Le'an R…
sentences.chinese: 此模型對樂安河重金屬污染預測有一定的參考價值。

definition: to spare no effort/to devote all one's energies
lit. stake a thousand pieces of gold on one throw (idiom); to throw away money recklessly/extravagant
to hire at a high salary
sth written or painted in one's own hand/(of a writer, calligrapher or painter) skill/style/hand/(fig.) style shown in spending money, handling business etc/scale
not stint/not spare/not hesitate (to do sth)/not scruple (to do sth)
